name: Bene
description:
You play as this lovely blue cube (or whatever color you want it to be) and have to navigate through platforms and obstacles. It's quite challenging to master but very addicting!

You move like in many other games with either the [W, A, S, D] or arrow keys.
Bene supports playing with a PS4 controller as well.

Your goal is to reach the finishline without falling down the platforms

The twist is the challenging camera movement. During each level, the camera rotates around the player which feels like the direction of the controls is constantly changing. 

You wake up as a blue cube in a strange world where everything tries to kill you. The only way to escape this world is by finishing all levels and defeating the final boss, Robobob.
